name: Corrupted Caverns
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 50 in 72 hours.

Delay the inevitable corruption to get enough resources to escape from the caverns. Sacrifice your tools to an energy converter to get energy to power beacons, the only way to prevent the spread of corruption.

Controls:

WASD - Move

Left Click - Mine; Attack

Right Click - Place

E - Inventory

Mouse Scroll - Change item in hand

If you're confused on how the game works, here are a few quick things to help out:

  • Place objects by right click on empty ground while having that item selected in your inventory
  • Put things into the furnace or energy converter by dragging and dropping the item from your inventory into the slot above the furnace or energy converter
  • The energy converter only accepts tools (shields, swords, & drills)
  • Furnaces only smelt ore
  • Put shields into your shield slot
  • Beacons only affect a certain radius around themselves
  • Fight enemies by clicking on them when they're nearby
